data.oai_dc:dc: Standardized phenotypic traits and relative fitness in the Anacamptis morio population in 2014

Standardized phenotypic traits (plant height, number of flowers, corolla area, spur length, petal brightness, central patch size, petal contrast, proportion dark markings) and relative fitness for 314 individuals of Anacamptis morio (178 open-pollinated controls and 136 supplementally hand-pollinated plants).
